body_html:
@kerstin ok, I've fixed the URL bug at the source, so I'm going to close this ticket now. The teams app will need to refresh the activity feed before the links will be correct though.

@svenfuchs is there a cron time set for the rake activity:update task?

body:
@kerstin ok, I've fixed the URL bug at [the source](http://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/blog.xml), so I'm going to close this ticket now.  The teams app will need to refresh the activity feed before the links will be correct though.

@svenfuchs is there a cron time set for the `rake activity:update` task?
